Label: Purpose
Rights Holder: To clarify which person or organization owns or controls the rights for this version of the item

Label: Entry Guidelines
Rights Holder: Enter the name of the person or organization. If applicable, the suggested controlled vocabulary is the Library of Congress Name Authority File.

Label: Commentary
Rights Holder: This field can be used for instances in which an an organization owns a digital copy of an analog resource or otherwise controls access. This is different from Provider, which refers more to the resource or metadata steward.
